page.title: 02HOME LIFE IN DRUIDS HEATH
page.content: HOME LIFE IN DRUIDS HEATH The most popular{ childrenÂ£s hobbies} around{ BellÂ£s Farmhouse} are sewing, collecting rubbers badges and sharpeners,playing football, swimming, playing darts and cycling.Most families like pop, Irish Folk and Country and Western music.Our cars are a Mini and Cortina.Our{ living room} furniture includes a colour television, a video recorder, a computer, a sterio hi Â£fiÂ£ unit and an imitation log fire.In the{ kitchen} we have a tumble dryer, a washing machine, a dishwasher and a micro-wave cooker.I have a small colour television in my bedroom.Last year my family went to Caernarvon in Wales for a Holiday.Our parents have all got jobs.Both our Dads work.One mum works as a secretary,the other is a manageress.By Cleo Vaughn and Christine Harris,Bells Farm J/I School.
